Resources.Source: The log parameter can not be null when the ValidationBehavior requires a log.
Resources.Translation: Quando ValidationBehavior richiede un log Il parametro log non puo' essere Null.

Resources.Source: (element has been removed)
Resources.Translation: (l'elemento e' stato rimosso)

Resources.Source: The referenced resource or organization can not be found.
Resources.Translation: Risorsa referenziata o organization non trovata.

Resources.Source: The <ruleCondition> node must have a condition attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <ruleCondition> deve avere un attributo condition. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.1.

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the node, {1}, is longer than that supported by MLC. It has been truncated to {2} characters.
Resources.Translation: Il valore del nodo che comincia con "{0}", {1}, e' piu' lungo di quello supportato da MLC. E' stato troncato di {2} caratteri.

Resources.Source: The value is out of range.
Resources.Translation: Valore fuori dall'intervallo.

Resources.Source: A <presentation> node may only appear, if needed, as a child of a leaf <item>element that references a resource.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo di <presentation> puo' apparire solamente, se necessario,come filgio(child) di un elemento pagiina (leaf) <item>che referenzia una risorsa.

Resources.Source: The value "{0}" of element <{1}> is an invalid value. Extra information: {2}
Resources.Translation: Il valore"{0}" dell'elemento<{1}> non e' valido. Dettagli: {2}

Resources.Source: A valid index.xml begins with a <LearningResource> node in the "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:learning-resource" namespace.
Resources.Translation: Un index.xml valido comincia con un nodo <LearningResource> nello spazio dei nomi (namespace) "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:learning-resource" .

Resources.Source: The resource node is missing the required attribute, 'href'
Resources.Translation: Attributo, 'href' mancante nella risorsa

Resources.Source: The <metadata> node is missing or in the wrong namespace on the <manifest>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.2.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <metadata> e' assente o nello spazio dei nomi (namespace) sbagliato del <manifest>. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.2.

Resources.Source: The required attribute, {0}, is missing on element <{1}>. Extra information:{2}
Resources.Translation: L'attributo richiesto, {0}, e' assente nell'elemento <{1}>. Dettagli: {2}

Resources.Source: The value is outside the valid range [-1 to 1].
Resources.Translation: Il valore e' al di fuori dell'intervallo valido [-1 to 1].

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the node, {1}, is longer than that supported by Microsoft Learning Components.
Resources.Translation: Il valore del nodo che comincia con "{0}", {1}, e' piu' lungo di quello supportato da Microsoft Learning Components.

Resources.Source: The name of the erroneous node is: {0}
Resources.Translation: Il nome del nodo errato e': {0}

Resources.Source: The value "{0}" of element <{1}> is an invalid value. It has been replaced by the default value "{2}". Extra information: {3}
Resources.Translation: Il valore "{0}" dell'elemento <{1}> non e' valido. Il valore non valido e' stato rimpiazzato da quello di default "{2}". Dettagli: {3}

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> can not be found in the correct namespace. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <{0}> non trovato nello spazio dei nomi (namespace) corretto. Dettagli:{1}

Resources.Source: The value is an invalid URI.
Resources.Translation: URI non valido.

Resources.Source: A default value of "{0}" has been used in place of the missing or erroneous value for the <{1}> element's "{2}" attribute.
Resources.Translation: Il valore di default "{0}" e' stato usato al posto del valore errato o assente nell'attributo <{1}> dell'elemento "{2}".

Resources.Source: The value is an invalid xml:base. xml:base must be a valid URI that does not begin with a "/" but does end with a "/".
Resources.Translation: Il valore per xml:base non e' valido. xml:base deve essere un URI valido che non cominci con "/" e finisca con "/".

Resources.Source: The referencedObjective attribute on the {0} node is whitespace only, which is invalid. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.1.
Resources.Translation: L'attributo referencedObjective sul nodo {0} e' uno spazio, non e' valido. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.1.

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> has a value that starts with "{1}" that is too long.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <{0}> ha un valore che comincia con "{1}" che e' troppo lungo.

Resources.Source: The full XML of the parent node is: {0}
Resources.Translation: L'XML completo del nodo parent e': {0}

Resources.Source: The value of the <{0}> element's "{1}" attribute is missing or erroneous.
Resources.Translation: Il valore dell'attributo <{0}> dell'elemento "{1}" e' mancante o errato.

Resources.Source: The <ruleAction> node may occur 1 and only 1 time within a <preConditionRule>, <postConditionRule>, or <exitConditionRule>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.2.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <ruleAction> puo' essere presente una sola volta in <preConditionRule>, <postConditionRule>, o <exitConditionRule>. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.2.

Resources.Source: The parent node is {0}.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo parent e' {0}.

Resources.Source: The <rollupCondition> node can only appear once in the <rollupRule> node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <rollupCondition> puo' essere presente una volta sola nel nodo <rollupRule>. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.1.

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> has a value that is too long. It has been truncated to "{1}".
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <{0}> ha un valore troppo lungo. E' stato troncato a "{1}".

Resources.Source: The parent node, {0}, must represent a SCO.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo parent , {0}, deve essere una SCO.

Resources.Source: The value is not one of the permitted token values.
Resources.Translation: Il valore non e' uno dei token permessi.

Resources.Source: The full XML of the erroneous node is: {0}
Resources.Translation: L'XML completo del nodo errato e': {0}

Resources.Source: The file, {0}, referenced by the location element inside of metadata in the manifest can not be found in the package.
Resources.Translation: Il file, {0}, referenziato nei metadata del manifest nell'elemento location non e' stato trovato nel package.

Resources.Source: The package is a multiple learning resource package, which is not supported.
Resources.Translation: Il package a risorse multiple, non e' supportato.

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> can not be found in the correct namespace An attempt will be made to find a child node with that name in other namespaces. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <{0}> non e' stato trovato nello spazio dei nomi (namespace). Sara' fatto un tentativo per trovare un nodo child con lo stesso nome negli altri spazi dei nomi (namespaces). Dettagli:{1}

Resources.Source: The <rollupAction> node can only appear once in the <rollupRule>node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.3.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <rollupAction> puo' apparire una sola volta nel nodo <rollupRule>. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.3.

Resources.Source: The value is not the expected type.
Resources.Translation: Il valore non e' del tipo atteso.

Resources.Source: The value of the <{0}> element is missing or erroneous.
Resources.Translation: Il valore dell'elemento <{0}> e' errato o assente.

Resources.Source: The value of the PageID attribute of the {0} element is invalid. The element has been omitted from the conversion.
Resources.Translation: Il valore dell'attributo PageID dell'elemento {0} non e' valido. L'elemento e' stato omesso dalla conversione.

Resources.Source: The file {0} is not a valid file type.
Resources.Translation: Il file {0} non e' di tipo valido.

Resources.Source: An element, <{0}>, is invalid because it is illegal or has illegal attribute values. Extra information: {1}
Resources.Translation: Un elemento, <{0}>, non e' valido perche' e' illegale o un suo attributo ha un valore illegale. Dettagli: {1}

Resources.Source: The "{0}" portion of attribute, {1}, on element <{2}> contains invalid URI characters. These have been converted into valid characters automatically. The new value is "{3}". Extra information: {4}.
Resources.Translation: La "{0}" parte dell'attributo, {1}, dell'elemento <{2}> contiene caratteri URI non validi. I caratteri errati sono stati convertiti automaticamente in caratteri validi. Il nuovo valore e' "{3}". Dettagli: {4}.

Resources.Source: The <title> node is required on the {0} node in Content Aggregation manifests. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.10, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.2.1.
Resources.Translation: Il <title> del nodo e' richiesto nel nodo {0} del Content Aggregation manifests. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.10, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.2.1.

Resources.Source: Remote content is not supported.
Resources.Translation: I contenuti remoti non sono supportati.

Resources.Source: This learning resource requires a license and licensed Learning Resources are not supported.
Resources.Translation: Questa risorsa (di apprendimento) richiede una licenza. Le Risorse di Apprendimento licenziate (licensed Learning Resources) non sono supportate.

Resources.Source: The value of the <prerequisites> type attribute must be "aicc_script".
Resources.Translation: Il valore dell'attributo <prerequisites> deve essere di tipo "aicc_script".

Resources.Source: A default value of "{0}" has been used in place of the missing or erroneous value for the <{1}> element.
Resources.Translation: Il valore "{0}" di default e' stato usato in sostituzione del valore assente o errato dell'elemento <{1}> .

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> has a value that starts with "{1}" that is too long for the "{2}" attribute.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <{0}> ha un valore che inizia con "{1}" che e' troppo lungo per l'attributo "{2}".

Resources.Source: The <item> node must have an identifier attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.9, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.2.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <item> deve avere un attributo identificativo. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.9, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.2.

Resources.Source: An Activity node is required for content used in Microsoft Learning Components.
Resources.Translation: Un nodo Activity e' richiesto per i contenuti utilizzati in Microsoft Learning Components.

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the node, <{1}>, is longer than the smallest permitted maximum (SPM), {2}.
Resources.Translation: Il valore del nodo che comincia con "{0}", <{1}>, e' piu' lungo dello smallest permitted maximum (SPM), {2}.

Resources.Source: The value "{0}" of attribute, {1}, on element <{2}>, is an invalid value. Extra information: {3}
Resources.Translation: Il valore "{0}" dell'attributo, {1}, nell'elemento <{2}>, non e' valido. Dettagli: {3}

Resources.Source: The value "{0}" of attribute, {1}, on element <{2}>, is an invalid value. It has been replaced by the default value "{3}". Extra information: {4}
Resources.Translation: Il valore "{0}" dell'attributo, {1}, nell'elemento <{2}>, non e' valido. E' stato rimpiazzato dal valore di default "{3}". Dettagli: {4}

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the attribute, {1}, is longer than that supported by Microsoft Learning Components. Extra information: {2}
Resources.Translation: Il valore del nodo che comincia con "{0}" dell'attributo, {1}, e' piu' lungo di quello supportato da Microsoft Learning Components. Dettagli: {2}

Resources.Source: A <manifest> node in the correct namespace is required.
Resources.Translation: E' richiesto un nodo <manifest> nello spazio dei nomi (namespace) corretto.

Resources.Source: A manifest is required and is not present in the package.
Resources.Translation: Nel package non e' presente un manifest.

Resources.Source: The value of the PageID attribute, {0}, on a <Page> element is used more than once. PageID's must be unique for each <Page> element.
Resources.Translation: Il valore dell'attributo PageID, {0}, sull'elemento <Page> e' utilizzato piu' di una volta. PageID deve essere univoco per ogni elemento <Page>.

Resources.Source: The <resource> node must have an identifier attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.21, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.4.1.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <resource> deve avere un attributo identificativo. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.21, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.4.1.

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> has a value that is too long for the "{1}" attribute. It has been truncated to "{2}".
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <{0}> ha un valore che e' troppo lungo per l'attributo "{1}". E' stato troncato a "{2}".

Resources.Source: (empty string)
Resources.Translation: (stringa vuota)

Resources.Source: In multiple <mapInfo> nodes, true values are restricted. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.2.
Resources.Translation: Nei nodi <mapInfo> multipli, I valori veri ( true) sono limitati. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.2.

Resources.Source: The referenced node can not be found.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo referenziato non puo' essere trovato.

Resources.Source: The value must be 0 or a positive integer.
Resources.Translation: Il valore deve essere 0 o un intero positivo.

Resources.Source: A resource that belongs to an activity must have a type attribute set to "webcontent", an adlcp:scormType attribute set to "sco" or "asset", and a valid href attribute. {0}
Resources.Translation: Una risorsa che appartiene ad un'attivita' deve avere l'attributo type uguale a "webcontent", l'attributo adlcp:scormType uguale a "sco" o "asset", e un attributo href valido. {0}

Resources.Source: If an <item> element is a parent element, the <item> may not reference a <resource>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.9. The full XML of the node is: {0}
Resources.Translation: Se un elemento <item> e' di tipo parent, l’ <item> non puo' referenziare una < resource>. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.9. L'XML completo del nodo e': {0}

Resources.Source: The <rollupCondition> node must have a condition attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.2.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <rollupCondition> deve avere un attributo condizione (condition). Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.2.

Resources.Source: The <ruleConditions> node can only appear once in the <{0}> node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <ruleConditions> puo' apparire una volta sola nel nodo <{0}>. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.

Resources.Source: In a list of <objectives>, there must be one and only one <primaryObjective> node.
Resources.Translation: In una lista di <objectives>, ci deve essere uno ed un solo nodo <primaryObjective>.

Resources.Source: There are multiple instances of element, <{0}>. All but the first are ignored. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: Ci sono istanze multiple dell'elemento, <{0}>. Tutte tranne la prima saranno ignorate. Dettagli:{1}

Resources.Source: The identifier is not a valid xs:ID.
Resources.Translation: L'identificativo non e' un xs:ID valido.

Resources.Source: The <minNormalizedMeasure> node can only appear once in the <{0} objectiveID="{1}"> node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <minNormalizedMeasure> puo' apparire una sola volta nel nodo<{0} objectiveID="{1}">. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.1.

Resources.Source: An Organization node is required for content used in Microsoft Learning Components.
Resources.Translation: Un nodo di tipo Organization e' necessario per i contenuti (content) utilizzati in Microsoft Learning Components.

Resources.Source: The duplicate nodes share the same {0} value, "{1}". The values must be different.
Resources.Translation: I nodi duplicati condividono lo stesso valore {0} , "{1}". I valori devono essere differenti.

Resources.Source: This package could not be opened. More information: {0}
Resources.Translation: Questa pacchetto (package) non puo' essere aperto. Dettagli: {0}

Resources.Source: The package contains a manifest that contains badly formed XML.
Resources.Translation: Il pacchetto (package) contiene un manifest il cui XML e' formattato male.

Resources.Source: The objective must have an objectiveID attribute. Extra information: {0}
Resources.Translation: L'obiettivo deve avere un attributo objectiveID. Dettagli: {0}

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the attribute, {1}, is longer than that supported by for content used in Microsoft Learning Components. It has been truncated to {2} characters. Extra information: {3}
Resources.Translation: Il valore che comincia con "{0}" dell'attributo, {1}, e' piu' lungo di quello supportato per i contenuti utilizzati in Microsoft Learning Components. E' stato troncato di {2} caratteri. Dettagli: {3}

Resources.Source: There are problems with the syntax of the prerequisite script, or a referenced identifier can not be found in the manifest.
Resources.Translation: Ci sono problemi con la sintassi dello script dei prerequisiti, o un identificativo referenziato non e' stato trovato nel manifest.

Resources.Source: The <organization> node must have an identifier attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.7, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <organization> deve avere un attributo identificativo. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.7, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.

Resources.Source: The file, {0}, referenced by the location element inside of metadata in the manifest contains invalid metadata.
Resources.Translation: Il file, {0}, referenziato dell'elemento location nei metadata del manifest contiene metadati non validi.

Resources.Source: The value is out of range [-1 to 1] on the <minNormalizedMeasure> node in the <{0} objectiveID="{1}"> node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Il valore e' fuori dall'intervallo [-1 to 1] nel nodo <minNormalizedMeasure> nel nodo <{0} objectiveID="{1}">. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.1.

Resources.Source: The <rollupAction> node is missing on an <rollupRule>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.3.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <rollupAction> e' assente in una <rollupRule>. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.3.

Resources.Source: The <sequencing> node in a <sequencingCollection> must have an ID attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <sequencing> in una <sequencingCollection> deve avere un attributo ID. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.1.

Resources.Source: Unable to substitute a default value for the missing value of node <{0}> because the conversion process is not allowed to substitute default values for missing or erroneous values in the index.xml.
Resources.Translation: Non sono in grado di sostituire il valore mancante del nodo <{0}> con quello di default; perche' al processo di conversione non e' consentito sostituire valori mancanti o errati in index.xml con valori di default.

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the attribute, {1}, is longer than the smallest permitted maximum (SPM), {2}. Extra information: {3}
Resources.Translation: Il valore che comincia con "{0}" dell'attributo, {1}, e' piu' lungo del smallest permitted maximum (SPM), {2}. Dettagli: {3}

Resources.Source: The required element, <{0}>, is missing. Default values will be used. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: L'elemento richiesto, <{0}>, e' assente. Verra' utilizzato il valore di Default. Dettagli:{1}

Resources.Source: The file {0} does not exist.
Resources.Translation: Il file {0} non esiste.

Resources.Source: The attribute, {1}, containing the value "{0}" on node <{2}> is illegal in Resource packages.
Resources.Translation: L'attributo, {1}, che contiene il valore "{0}" nel nodo <{2}> e' illegale nei pacchetti Risorse (Resource packages).

Resources.Source: The value must be a decimal value from 0 to 1, inclusive.
Resources.Translation: Il valore deve essere un decimale compreso tra 0 e 1.

Resources.Source: The <rollupConditions> node is missing on an <rollupRule>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <rollupConditions> e' assente in una <rollupRule>. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.1.

Resources.Source: <sequencingCollection> nodes are not permitted in resource packages. This manifest is considered a resource package because it has no <organization> nodes. See SCORM CAM 3.5.3.
Resources.Translation: I nodi <sequencingCollection> non sono permessi nei pacchetti risorse (resource packages). Questo manifest e' considerato un pacchetto risorse perche' non ha nodi <organization>. Vedi SCORM CAM 3.5.3.

Resources.Source: The <file> node must have an href attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.23, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.4.3.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <file> deve avere un attributo href. Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.23, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.4.3.

Resources.Source: The <title> node is missing on the <organization> node with identifier="{0}". See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.8, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Il nodo <title> e' assente sul nodo <organization> con identificativo (identifier)="{0}". Vedi SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.8, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.1.

Resources.Source: UA !There are multiple instances of element, <{0}>. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: UA !Ci sono istanze multiple dell'elemento, <{0}>. Dettagli:{1}

Resources.Source: The "{0}" value of attribute, {1}, on element <{2}> contains spaces, which are invalid URI characters. This URI is still being allowed, but the package may not work as expected.
Resources.Translation: Il valore "{0}" dell'attributo {1}, dell'elemento <{2}> contiene spazi, che sono caratteri URI non validi. Questo URI e' ancora ammesso, ma il pacchetto (package) potrebbe comportarsi in modo diverso da quello atteso.

Resources.Source: The file {0} is not referenced in the manifest.
Resources.Translation: Il file {0} non e' referenziato nel manifest.

Resources.Source: The required element, <{0}>, is missing. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: L'elemento richiesto, <{0}>, e' assente. Dettagli:{1}

Resources.Source: Data model element '{0}' was passed a value that exceeded the supported length.
Resources.Translation: E' stato passato all'elemento '{0}' del Data model un valore che eccede la lunghezza supportata.

Resources.Source: The package compression format is not supported.
Resources.Translation: Il formato di compressione del pacchetto (package) non e' supportato.

Resources.Source: Sequencing is flowing to activity '{0}'.
Resources.Translation: La sequenza sta andando all'attivita' '{0}'.

Resources.Source: The .zip file cannot be found.
Resources.Translation: File .zip non trovato.

Resources.Source: The value cannot be set to null.
Resources.Translation: Il valore non puo' essere nullo (null).

Resources.Source: A parameter contains an empty string, which is not allowed.
Resources.Translation: Il parametro contiene una stringa vuota. Non e' consentito.

Resources.Source: The requested item, {0}, can not be accessed.
Resources.Translation: L'item richiesto, {0}, non e' accessibile.

Resources.Source: No unique identifiers are defined for items in this list.
Resources.Translation: Per gli items di questa lista non e' stato definito l'identificativo univoco.

Resources.Source: Choice Exit Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Violazione Choice Exit Sequencing Control Mode.

Resources.Source: No activities to consider.
Resources.Translation: Nessuna attivita' da considerare.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' corrente non e' definita. La sessione di sequencing non e' stata iniziata.

Resources.Source: A suspended activity is not defined.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' sospesa non e' definita.

Resources.Source: A current activity is already defined. The sequencing session has already begun.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' corrente e' gia' definita. La sessione di sequencing e' gia' cominciata.

Resources.Source: No activity is "previous" to the root.
Resources.Translation: Nessuna attivita' e' "precedente" alla root.

Resources.Source: Unsupported navigation request.
Resources.Translation: Richiesta di navigazione non supportata.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Violazione Flow Sequencing Control Mode.

Resources.Source: Flow or Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Violazione Flow or Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode .

Resources.Source: Rollup aborted because child activity '{0}' does not have a primary objective.
Resources.Translation: Rollup fallito perche' l'attivita' figlia '{0}' non ha un obiettivo primario.

Resources.Source: RetryAll
Resources.Translation: RetryAll

Resources.Source: Identified activity is already active.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' individuata e' gia' attiva.

Resources.Source: Read error.
Resources.Translation: Errore di lettura.

Resources.Source: Activity '{0}' skipped because its pre-condition Skip rules evaluated as true.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' '{0}' saltata (skipped) perche' le sue pre-condizioni relative alla regole di salto (pre-condition Skip rules) sono vere.

Resources.Source: The ZipPackageReader has encountered an error and cannot continue.
Resources.Translation: Il ZipPackageReader ha rilevato un errore e non puo' proseguire.

Resources.Source: The item specified is already added to this or another list belonging to this data model.
Resources.Translation: L'item specificato e' gia' stato aggiunto a questa o ad un'altra lista che appartiene a questo data model.

Resources.Source: Rollup initiated for activity '{0}'.
Resources.Translation: Iniziato Rollup per l'attivita' '{0}'.

Resources.Source: The entry point of the current activity is not contained within this package.
Resources.Translation: Questo pacchetto non contiene il punto d'entrata (entry point) per l'attivita' corrente.

Resources.Source: Retry
Resources.Translation: Retry

Resources.Source: End of stream reached.
Resources.Translation: Raggiunta la fine dello stream.

Resources.Source: A required identifier was not provided for this element.
Resources.Translation: Un identificativo richiesto non e' stato fornito per questo elemento.

Resources.Source: ExitAll
Resources.Translation: ExitAll

Resources.Source: Stream must have read and seek capability.
Resources.Translation: Lo Stream deve avere capacita' di lettura e ricerca.

Resources.Source: The key specified '{0}' does not match the identifier within the item to be added to the dictionary '{1}'.
Resources.Translation: Il valore chiave specificato '{0}' non coincide con l'identificativo dentro l'item che deve essere aggiunto al dizionario '{1}'.

Resources.Source: Sequencing Post Condition rule on activity '{0}' resulted in a {1} request.
Resources.Translation: Nell'attivita' '{0}' la regola Sequencing Post Condition e' risultata nella richiesta {1}.

Resources.Source: The value cannot be set to an empty or null string.
Resources.Translation: Il valore non puo' essere assegnato ad una stringa nulla (null) o vuota.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to reactivate the current session. Only a completed or abandoned session may be reactivated, and only in RandomAccess view.
Resources.Translation: Non possibile riattivare la sessione corrente. Solo le sessioni completate o abbandonate possono essere riattivate, e solo nelle visualizzazioni di tipo RandomAccess.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to exit the current session. Only a session that has started may be exited, and only in Execute view.
Resources.Translation: Non e' possibile uscire dalla sessione corrente. e' possibile uscire solo dalle sessioni che sonno state avviate, e solo nelle visualizzazioni di tipo Execute.

Resources.Source: Cannot remove or replace the primary objective.
Resources.Translation: Non posso rimuovere o rimpiazzare l'obiettivo primario.

Resources.Source: A CurrentActivity that is active is required to exist before requesting this operation.
Resources.Translation: A CurrentActivity attiva e' necessaria prima che sia richiesta questa operazione.

Resources.Source: Cannot change the identifier if an item in a dictionary. Try removing the item, changing the identifier, then re-adding it.
Resources.Translation: Non posso cambiare l'identificativo se e' una voce (item) di un dizionario. Prova a cancellare la voce (item), modificare l'identificativo, e aggiungerlo di nuovo.

Resources.Source: The '{0}' data model element is only valid in SCORM 2004 packages.
Resources.Translation: L'elemento '{0}' del data model e valido solo nei pacchetti (packages) SCORM 2004.

Resources.Source: The '{0}' data model element is only valid in SCORM 1.2 packages.
Resources.Translation: L'elemento '{0}' del data model e valido solo nei pacchetti (packages) SCORM 1.2.

Resources.Source: The index is out of range.
Resources.Translation: L'indice e' fuori dall'intervallo.

Resources.Source: ExitParent
Resources.Translation: ExitParent

Resources.Source: The current activity in the session defines an entry point that does not exist in the package. The content cannot be read.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' corrente nella sessione definisce un punto (entry point) di entrata che non esiste nel pacchetto (package). Il contenuto non puo' essere letto.

Resources.Source: An object created for use by a different data model cannot be added to this data model.
Resources.Translation: Un oggetto creato per l'utilizzo con un data model diverso non puo' essere aggiunto a questo data model.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to resume the current session. Only a suspended session may be resumed, and only in Execute view.
Resources.Translation: Non e' possibile ripristinare la sessione corrente. Solo le sessioni sospese possono essere ripristinate, e solo nelle visualizzazioni di tipo Execute.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to suspend the current session. Only an active session may be suspended, and only in Execute view.
Resources.Translation: Non e' possibile sospendere la sessione corrente. Solo le sessioni attive possono essere sospese,e solo nelle visualizzazioni di tipo Execute.

Resources.Source: The package is missing the required file, imsmanifest.xml.
Resources.Translation: Nel pacchetto e' assente il file richiesto, imsmanifest.xml.

Resources.Source: The requested directory, {0}, can not be found.
Resources.Translation: La cartella richiesta, {0}, non è stata trovata.

Resources.Source: The list cannot be modified.
Resources.Translation: La lista non puo' essere modificata.

Resources.Source: Undefined navigation request.
Resources.Translation: Richiesta di navigazione non definita.

Resources.Source: The current activty is already terminated.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' corrente e' gia' terminata.

Resources.Source: Target activity does not exist.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' target non esiste.

Resources.Source: Choice Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Violazione Choice Sequencing Control Mode.

Resources.Source: The RenderContext.RelativePath must have a value.
Resources.Translation: RenderContext.RelativePath deve essere valorizzata.

Resources.Source: An error occurred while unbundling the file. The Index.xml or imsmanifest.xml file cannot be found.
Resources.Translation: Si e' verificato un errore nello spacchettamento (unbundling) del file. Index.xml o imsmanifest.xml non trovati.

Resources.Source: An item with the identifier '{0}' already exists in this list.
Resources.Translation: Un item con identificativo '{0}' e' gia' presente nella lista.

Resources.Source: The requested file was not found in the package.
Resources.Translation: Il file richiesto non e' stato trovato nel pacchetto (package).

Resources.Source: Data model element '{0}' was passed a value that was out of range according to the SCORM 2004 specifications.
Resources.Translation: E' stato passato un valore all'elemento '{0}' del Data model che e' al di fuori dell'intervallo ammesso da SCORM 2004.

Resources.Source: Continue
Resources.Translation: Continue

Resources.Source: An error occurred while unbundling the file. Unable to determine the file format.
Resources.Translation: Si e' verificato un errore nello spacchettamento (unbundling) del file. Non e' stato possibile determinare il formato del file.

Resources.Source: Navigation resulted in making '{0}' the current active activity.
Resources.Translation: Risultati della navigazione facendo '{0}' l’attivita' corrente attiva.

Resources.Source: An error occurred while unbundling the file. A file with multiple Learning Resources is not supported.
Resources.Translation: Si e' verificato un errore nello spacchettamento (unbundling) del file. Non e' supportato un file con risorse di apprendimento (Learning Resources) multiple .

Resources.Source: Sequencing cannot proceed because the required objective '{0}' was not found.
Resources.Translation: Non e' possibile procedere con la sequenza (sequencing) perche' l'obiettivo richiesto '{0}' non e' stato trovato.

Resources.Source: Data model element '{0}' was passed a value that was out of range according to the SCORM 1.2 specifications.
Resources.Translation: E' stato passato un valore all'elemento '{0}' del Data model che e' al di fuori dell'intervallo ammesso da SCORM 1.2.

Resources.Source: This LearningDataModel object may not be written to.
Resources.Translation: Non e' possibile scrivere su questo oggetto LearningDataModel.

Resources.Source: Unsupported type '{0}' added to extension data.
Resources.Translation: Il tipo non supportato '{0}' e' stato aggiunto ai dati estesi.

Resources.Source: Rollup setting normalized measure to {0} for activity '{1}'.
Resources.Translation: Rollup setting normalized measure to {0} for activity '{1}'.

Resources.Source: The relativePath value '{0}' does not represent a valid, package-relative path.
Resources.Translation: Il valore relativePath '{0}' non rappresenta un percorso relativo del pacchetto (package-relative) valido.

Resources.Source: Cannot copy to '{0}' because a file or directory with the same name already exists. This operation can only copy to a destination that does not yet exist. It will create the destination directory.
Resources.Translation: Non e' possibile copiare in '{0}' perche' esiste gia' una cartella o un file con lo stesso nome. Questa operazione puo' copiare solo in una destinazione che non esiste. Dovrai creare la cartella di destinazione.

Resources.Source: Navigation complete. No current activity.
Resources.Translation: Navigazione completata. Nessuna attivita' corrente.

Resources.Source: Sequencing Exit rule requires that activity '{0}' terminate.
Resources.Translation: La regola Sequencing Exit richiede che l'attivita' '{0}' sia terminata.

Resources.Source: No item with the identifier '{0}' was found in this list.
Resources.Translation: Nessuna voce (item) con identificativo '{0}' trovata in questa lista.

Resources.Source: Error code: {0}
Resources.Translation: Codice di errore: {0}

Resources.Source: A CurrentActivity is required to exist before requesting this operation.
Resources.Translation: E' necessario che esista una CurrentActivity prima di poter richiedere questa operazione.

Resources.Source: The object is not in the correct NameTable.
Resources.Translation: L'oggetto non e' nella NameTable corretta.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Violazione del Flow Sequencing Control Mode.

Resources.Source: The current activity is active or suspended.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' corrente e' attiva o sospesa.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' corrente non e' definita. La sessione di sequencing non e' stata iniziata.

Resources.Source: Undefined sequencing request.
Resources.Translation: Richiesta di sequencing non definita.

Resources.Source: The current activity has not been terminated.
Resources.Translation: L’attivita' corrente non e' stata terminata.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' corrente non e' definita. La sessione di sequencing non e' stata iniziata.

Resources.Source: Previous
Resources.Translation: Previous

Resources.Source: The Current activity already terminated.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' corrente e' gia' terminata.

Resources.Source: Cannot suspend an inactive root.
Resources.Translation: Non e' possibile sospendere una root inattiva.

Resources.Source: A Current Activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' corrente non e' definita. La sessione di sequencing non e' stata iniziata.

Resources.Source: Nothing to abandon; no active activities.
Resources.Translation: Niente da abbandonare; nessuna attivita' attiva.

Resources.Source: Undefined termination request.
Resources.Translation: Richiesta terminazione non definita.

Resources.Source: Activity tree root has no parent.
Resources.Translation: Il tree root delle attivita' non ha parent.

Resources.Source: Nothing to suspend; no active activities.
Resources.Translation: Niente da sospendere; nessuna attivita' attiva.

Resources.Source: A current activity is defined. The sequencing session already begun.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' corrente e' definita. La sessione di sequencing e' gia' stata iniziata.

Resources.Source: No Suspended Activity defined.
Resources.Translation: Nessuna attivita' sospesa definita.

Resources.Source: A current activity is defined. The sequencing session already begun.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' corrente e' definita. La sessione di sequencing e' gia' stata iniziata.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Violazione del Flow Sequencing Control Mode.

Resources.Source: Activity unavailable.
Resources.Translation: Attivita' non disponibile.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' corrente non e' definita. La sessione di sequencing non e' stata iniziata.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Violazione del Flow Sequencing Control Mode.

Resources.Source: Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Violazione del Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode.

Resources.Source: No activity is "previous" to the root.
Resources.Translation: Nessuna attivita' e' "precedente" alla (root).

Resources.Source: Forward Traversal Blocked.
Resources.Translation: Forward Traversal Blocked.

Resources.Source: Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Violazione del Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode .

Resources.Source: No activity is "previous" to the root.
Resources.Translation: Nessuna attivita' e' "precedente" alla (root).

Resources.Source: Cluster has no available children.
Resources.Translation: Cluster non ha figli (children) disponibili.

Resources.Source: Last activity in the tree.
Resources.Translation: Ultima attivita' dell'albero (tree).

Resources.Source: Choice request prevented by Flow-only activity.
Resources.Translation: Selezione obbligata evitata dalla attivita' Flow-only.

Resources.Source: Unable to choose target activity - constrained choice.
Resources.Translation: Non e' possibile selezionare l'attivita' target - scelta obbligata.

Resources.Source: Choice Exit Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Violazione del Choice Exit Sequencing Control Mode.

Resources.Source: Unable to activate target; target is not a child of the Current Activity.
Resources.Translation: Non e' possibile attivare il target; non e' figlio (child) dell'Attivita' Corrente.

Resources.Source: No activities to consider.
Resources.Translation: Nessuna attivita' da considerare.

Resources.Source: Choice Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Violazione del Choice Sequencing Control Mode.

Resources.Source: Target activity hidden from choice.
Resources.Translation: Non e' possibile selezionare la Target activity.

Resources.Source: Target activity does not exist or is unavailable.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' Target non esiste o non e' disponibile.

Resources.Source: No target for Choice.
Resources.Translation: Nessun target da selezionare.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Violazione del Flow Sequencing Control Mode.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: L'attivita' corrente non e' definita. La sessione di sequencing non e' stata iniziata.

Resources.Source: Activity unavailable.
Resources.Translation: Attivita' non disponibile.

Resources.Source: Nothing to deliver.
Resources.Translation: Niente da recapitare (deliver).

Resources.Source: Cannot deliver a non-leaf activity.
Resources.Translation: Non e' possibile recapitare attivita' non foglia non-leaf.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to abandon the current session. Only an active or suspended session may be abandoned, and only in Execute view.
Resources.Translation: Non e' possibile abbandonare la sessione corrente. Solo le sessioni attive o sospese possono essere abbandonate, e solo nelle visualizzazioni di tipo Execute.

Resources.Source: The requested manifest file cannot be rendered.
Resources.Translation: Il file manifest selezionato non puo' essere elaborato (rendered).

Resources.Source: or
Resources.Translation: o

Resources.Source: <script language="javascript"> var ECS_ViewType=2; //============================================================================= // Handles calls to detach an attached file. The id of this question will // be sent in the hidDetach field. At the server end, if this value is // non-zero, then there is a file to be detached.. function OnDetach( attachmentId ) { // attachmentId is of the form <interactionId>*A*<attachmentOrdinal> var oForm = document.forms["frmPage"]; oForm.elements["hidDetach"].value = attachmentId; oForm.submit(); } </script>
Resources.Translation: <script language="javascript"> var ECS_ViewType=2; //============================================================================= // Handles calls to detach an attached file. The id of this question will // be sent in the hidDetach field. At the server end, if this value is // non-zero, then there is a file to be detached.. function OnDetach( attachmentId ) { // attachmentId is of the form <interactionId>*A*<attachmentOrdinal> var oForm = document.forms["frmPage"]; oForm.elements["hidDetach"].value = attachmentId; oForm.submit(); } </script>

Resources.Source: Not selected
Resources.Translation: Non selezionato

Resources.Source: Choose a file to attach:
Resources.Translation: Scegli un file da allegare:

Resources.Source: The form field, {0}, is missing.
Resources.Translation: Campo, {0}, del form non trovato.

Resources.Source: Correct answer
Resources.Translation: Risposta corretta

Resources.Source: A requested file could not be found.
Resources.Translation: Il file richiesto non e' stato trovato.

Resources.Source: No file attached.
Resources.Translation: Nessun file allegato.

Resources.Source: Incorrect answer
Resources.Translation: Risposta non corretta

Resources.Source: Incorrect answer
Resources.Translation: Risposta non corretta

Resources.Source: Detach File
Resources.Translation: Scollega il file

Resources.Source: A requested file attachment could not be found.
Resources.Translation: Il file da allegare non e' stato trovato.

Resources.Source: View File
Resources.Translation: Visualizza File

Resources.Source: <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript"> var ECS_ViewType=6; function mlc_RoundTwoDecimalPlaces(val) { return (Math.round( val * 100 ) / 100); } function mlc_CultureStringToDouble(score) { var re = new RegExp( "^[\\+\\-]?[0-9]*(\\x<%=DecimalSeparatorHex%>)?[0-9]*$" ); var check = score.match(re); if( check == null ) return NaN; else return parseFloat(score.replace( "<%=DecimalSeparator%>", "." )); } function mlc_DoubleToCultureString(dbl) { // convert a double into a string, using the supplied decimal separator. return dbl.toString(10).replace( ".", "<%=DecimalSeparator%>" ); } function mlc_ValidateScore(itemscore) { var score = itemscore.value.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g, ""); var scoreAsFloat = mlc_CultureStringToDouble(score); if( isNaN(scoreAsFloat) || scoreAsFloat < -1000 || scoreAsFloat > 1000 ) { if( score != "" ) { alert(<%=ScoreOutOfRange%>); setTimeout( "document.forms[\"<%=FormId%>\"].elements[\"" + itemscore.id + "\"].select()", 1 ); return false; } } else { itemscore.value = mlc_DoubleToCultureString(mlc_RoundTwoDecimalPlaces( scoreAsFloat )); return true; } } function mlc_ValidateComment(commentField) { if( commentField.innerText.length > <%=MaxCommentLength%> ) { alert(<%=CommentTooLong%>); setTimeout( "document.forms[\"<%=FormId%>\"].elements[\"" + commentField.id + "\"].select()", 1 ); return false; } else { return true; } } function mlc_RubricClick(checkbox, itemscoreName) { // increment or decrement the corresponding ITEMSCORE. Note that a blank ITEMSCORE is the same as 0. var scoreTextBox = document.forms["<%=FormId%>"].elements[itemscoreName]; var scoreAsFloat = mlc_CultureStringToDouble(scoreTextBox.value); var deltaScoreAsFloat = mlc_CultureStringToDouble(checkbox.value); if( isNaN(scoreAsFloat) ) scoreAsFloat = 0; if( isNaN(deltaScoreAsFloat) ) deltaScoreAsFloat = 0; if( checkbox.checked ) { scoreTextBox.value = mlc_DoubleToCultureString(mlc_RoundTwoDecimalPlaces(scoreAsFloat + deltaScoreAsFloat)); } else { scoreTextBox.value = mlc_DoubleToCultureString(mlc_RoundTwoDecimalPlaces(scoreAsFloat - deltaScoreAsFloat)); } scoreTextBox.select(); } </script>
Resources.Translation: <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript"> var ECS_ViewType=6; function mlc_RoundTwoDecimalPlaces(val) { return (Math.round( val * 100 ) / 100); } function mlc_CultureStringToDouble(score) { var re = new RegExp( "^[\\+\\-]?[0-9]*(\\x<%=DecimalSeparatorHex%>)?[0-9]*$" ); var check = score.match(re); if( check == null ) return NaN; else return parseFloat(score.replace( "<%=DecimalSeparator%>", "." )); } function mlc_DoubleToCultureString(dbl) { // convert a double into a string, using the supplied decimal separator. return dbl.toString(10).replace( ".", "<%=DecimalSeparator%>" ); } function mlc_ValidateScore(itemscore) { var score = itemscore.value.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g, ""); var scoreAsFloat = mlc_CultureStringToDouble(score); if( isNaN(scoreAsFloat) || scoreAsFloat < -1000 || scoreAsFloat > 1000 ) { if( score != "" ) { alert(<%=ScoreOutOfRange%>); setTimeout( "document.forms[\"<%=FormId%>\"].elements[\"" + itemscore.id + "\"].select()", 1 ); return false; } } else { itemscore.value = mlc_DoubleToCultureString(mlc_RoundTwoDecimalPlaces( scoreAsFloat )); return true; } } function mlc_ValidateComment(commentField) { if( commentField.innerText.length > <%=MaxCommentLength%> ) { alert(<%=CommentTooLong%>); setTimeout( "document.forms[\"<%=FormId%>\"].elements[\"" + commentField.id + "\"].select()", 1 ); return false; } else { return true; } } function mlc_RubricClick(checkbox, itemscoreName) { // increment or decrement the corresponding ITEMSCORE. Note that a blank ITEMSCORE is the same as 0. var scoreTextBox = document.forms["<%=FormId%>"].elements[itemscoreName]; var scoreAsFloat = mlc_CultureStringToDouble(scoreTextBox.value); var deltaScoreAsFloat = mlc_CultureStringToDouble(checkbox.value); if( isNaN(scoreAsFloat) ) scoreAsFloat = 0; if( isNaN(deltaScoreAsFloat) ) deltaScoreAsFloat = 0; if( checkbox.checked ) { scoreTextBox.value = mlc_DoubleToCultureString(mlc_RoundTwoDecimalPlaces(scoreAsFloat + deltaScoreAsFloat)); } else { scoreTextBox.value = mlc_DoubleToCultureString(mlc_RoundTwoDecimalPlaces(scoreAsFloat - deltaScoreAsFloat)); } scoreTextBox.select(); } </script>

Resources.Source: Browse...
Resources.Translation: Esplora...

Resources.Source: The type attribute has an invalid value in the assessment markup: {0}
Resources.Translation: L'attributo type ha un valore non valido nell'assessment markup: {0}

Resources.Source: Instructor comments:
Resources.Translation: Commenti istruttore:

Resources.Source: <Unanswered>
Resources.Translation: <Senza risposta>

Resources.Source: "The text entered is formatted incorrectly or greater than the maximum {0} characters."
Resources.Translation: "Il testo inserito e' formattato in modo incorretto o piu' grande del numero massimo di caratteri {0} consentiti."

Resources.Source: The posted <option> value, {0}, is out of range for the <select> tag with name="{1}".
Resources.Translation: Il valore posted <option> , {0}, e' al di fuori dell’intervallo per il <select> tag con nome ="{1}".

Resources.Source: <script language="javascript"> var ECS_ViewType=4; </script>
Resources.Translation: <script language="javascript"> var ECS_ViewType=4; </script>

Resources.Source: Correct answer
Resources.Translation: Risposta corretta

Resources.Source: View the attached file.
Resources.Translation: Vedi il file allegato.

Resources.Source: The value, {0}, of the form field, {1}, is invalid.
Resources.Translation: Il valore, {0}, del campo, {1}, del form non e' valido.

Resources.Source: "The score entered is formatted incorrectly or outside the allowable range of -1000 to 1000."
Resources.Translation: "Il punteggio inserito non e' formattato correttamente o al di fuori dell'intervallo consentito (-1000 a 1000)."

Resources.Source: Correct answer:
Resources.Translation: Risposta corretta:

Resources.Source: Selected
Resources.Translation: Selezionata

Resources.Source: This is the correct answer but it was not selected
Resources.Translation: Questa e' la risposta corretta ma non e' stata selezionata

Resources.Source: There is an attached {0} file.
Resources.Translation: C'e' un file {0} allegato.

Resources.Source: Replace the attached file with another file:
Resources.Translation: Rimpiazza il file allegato con un altro file:

Resources.Source: The value of the id is invalid in the assessment markup: {0}
Resources.Translation: Il valore dell'id non e' valido nell'assessment markup: {0}
